entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning.
